verses.verse: This <S%H2088><s%> is the book <S%H5612><s%> of the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Adam. <S%H121><s%> In the day <S%H3117><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> created <S%H1254><s%> man, <S%H120><s%> he made <S%H6213><s%> him in God <S%H430><s%>'s likeness. <S%H1823><s%>

He created <S%H1254><s%> them male <S%H2145><s%> and female, <S%H5347><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> them, <S%H7121><s%> and called their name <S%H8034><s%> "Adam, <S%H120><s%>" in the day <S%H3117><s%> when they were created. <S%H1254><s%>

Adam <S%H121><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of a son in his own likeness, <S%H1823><s%> after his image, <S%H6754><s%> and named <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H7121><s%> Seth. <S%H8352><s%>

The days <S%H3117><s%> of Adam <S%H121><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Seth <S%H8352><s%> were eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and he became the father <S%H3205><s%> of sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
All the days <S%H3117><s%> that Adam <S%H121><s%> lived <S%H2425><s%> were nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> then he died. <S%H4191><s%>
Seth <S%H8352><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Enosh. <S%H583><s%>

Seth <S%H8352><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Enosh <S%H583><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
All the days <S%H3117><s%> of Seth <S%H8352><s%> were nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> twelve <S%H6240><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> then he died. <S%H4191><s%>
Enosh <S%H583><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> ninety <S%H8673><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Kenan. <S%H7018><s%>

Enosh <S%H583><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Kenan, <S%H7018><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> fifteen <S%H6240><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
All the days <S%H3117><s%> of Enosh <S%H583><s%> were nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> then he died. <S%H4191><s%>
Kenan <S%H7018><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Mahalalel. <S%H4111><s%>

Kenan <S%H7018><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Mahalalel <S%H4111><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters <S%H1323><s%>
and all the days <S%H3117><s%> of Kenan <S%H7018><s%> were nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> then he died. <S%H4191><s%>
Mahalalel <S%H4111><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%>- five <S%H2568><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jared. <S%H3382><s%>

Mahalalel <S%H4111><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Jared <S%H3382><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> thirty <S%H7970><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
All the days <S%H3117><s%> of Mahalalel <S%H4111><s%> were eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> ninety <S%H8673><s%>- five <S%H2568><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> then he died. <S%H4191><s%>
Jared <S%H3382><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Enoch. <S%H2585><s%>

Jared <S%H3382><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Enoch <S%H2585><s%> eight <S%H8083><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
All the days <S%H3117><s%> of Jared <S%H3382><s%> were nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> then he died. <S%H4191><s%>
Enoch <S%H2585><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Methuselah. <S%H4968><s%>

Enoch <S%H2585><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> with <S%H854><s%> God <S%H430><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Methuselah <S%H4968><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
All the days <S%H3117><s%> of Enoch <S%H2585><s%> were three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>
Enoch <S%H2585><s%> walked <S%H1980><s%> with God, <S%H430><s%> and he was not, <S%H430><s%> for God took him. <S%H3947><s%>
Methuselah <S%H4968><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> eighty <S%H8084><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Lamech. <S%H3929><s%>

Methuselah <S%H4968><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Lamech <S%H3929><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> eighty <S%H8084><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
All the days <S%H3117><s%> of Methuselah <S%H4968><s%> were nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> nine <S%H8672><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> then he died. <S%H4191><s%>
Lamech <S%H3929><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> one hundred <S%H3967><s%> eighty <S%H8084><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of a son, <S%H1121><s%>

and he named <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H7121><s%> Noah, <S%H5146><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "This same will comfort <S%H5162><s%> us in our work <S%H4639><s%> and in the toil <S%H6093><s%> of our hands, <S%H3027><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%> which Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has cursed. <S%H779><s%>"

Lamech <S%H3929><s%> lived <S%H2421><s%> after <S%H310><s%> he became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Noah <S%H5146><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> ninety <S%H8673><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> and became the father <S%H3205><s%> of sons <S%H1121><s%> and daughters. <S%H1323><s%>
All the days <S%H3117><s%> of Lamech <S%H3929><s%> were seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> then he died. <S%H4191><s%>

Noah <S%H5146><s%> was five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old, <S%H1121><s%> and Noah <S%H5146><s%> became the father <S%H3205><s%> of Shem, <S%H8035><s%> Ham, <S%H2526><s%> and Japheth. <S%H3315><s%>
